articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign update brings new challenges and a welcome live service twist - Eurogamer
articles.description: A new update for Elden Ring Nightreign has been shadow dropped, bringing stronger Nightlords to defeat on a weekly basis.

articles.title: New Linux Flaws Enable Full Root Access via PAM and Udisks Across Major Distributions - The Hacker News
articles.description: Linux systems face critical local privilege escalation threats via CVE-2025-6018/6019 flaws—users must patch now.

articles.title: Report: Google's switch to TSMC for Pixel 10 chip was a 'shock' and wake-up call for Samsung - 9to5Google
articles.description: According to a report, Google's shift to TSMC for the Pixel 10's Tensor G5 chip was a "shock" to Samsung and is serving as a wake-up call.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch update 20.1.5 out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch just received its latest firmware update with version 20.1.5 and you can read the patch notes here.

articles.title: How to unlock Peter Pan in Disney Dreamlight Valley - Dexerto
articles.description: Peter Pan has finally arrived in Disney Dreamlight Valley as part of the Mysteries of Skull Rock update. But, unlocking him isn’t easy.

articles.title: All the New CarPlay Features in iOS 26 - Lifehacker
articles.description: It's a lot more than just Liquid Glass.
